thread.title: Good location, good wifi, rubbish service
thread.title_full: Good location, good wifi, rubbish service - Review of Ibis London Euston St Pancras, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Keeb_C
title: Good location, good wifi, rubbish service
text:
I travelled to London for one night for business.
The check in process was really poor as I think there are building works going on so all the customer service desks were closed. As a result there were ad-hoc lines being formed by customers in random places and checking in took a very long time.
The room was adequate and comfortable. The wifi was also excellent and I was able to stream videos on my laptop.
I was quite busy during the night so I wanted to get food to the room. There were some food menus in the room. I rang the reception - no answer and so went down to reception. They said that they could prepare my food for me but that I would have to come back down and pick it up. I was literally a two minute walk away, would it have been too painful for the staff to just drop it off at my room? I would have tipped them generously....
Then I wanted to sleep around 12am, but the chap next door had left his TV on full blast and wouldn't answer his phone or open his door when I came knocking. Again, no answer from reception when I tried to ring so had to go down and tell them to sort it out. It took them 30 minutes to get it sorted out.
I know it's probably a one off set of experiences, but I won't be staying here again - despite the good location.
